name: SpareRoom
tag_list: flatshare, houseshare, lodger, landlord, rental, sharing, accommodation, property, room-rentals, tenants, landlords
overview:
SpareRoom is the UK’s most popular flatshare site. Over 4 times bigger than its nearest competitor, it has over two thirds market share, and leads the way in terms of innovation, customer service, products and guidance.

SpareRoom helps people find flatmates, rooms to rent, tenants or lodgers, according to their needs, whether they are students, young professionals, homeowners or professional landlords. Our basic service is free to use and most don’t pay a penny to advertise on SpareRoom. For those who want to reach their goals a little faster, there’s an option to upgrade. Upgrading gives your ad more prominence and allows you to contact everyone right away.

A unique feature that sets SpareRoom apart from competitors is our focus on safety and security. Many property websites are plagued with spam and scammers, trying to relieve unsuspecting people of large amounts of cash. We screen all ads and messages, and prevent most scam attempts from ever being seen by our customers. And if we do get alerted to any fraudulent behaviour, we follow it up assiduously, and warn any other users who may have had contact with the suspicious character involved.

Additional services for landlords include Tenant Referencing, Featured Advertising and Lodger Packs.

SpareRoom is accessible via web, mobile, and dedicated iphone app.
